problem.title: 针对训练1：裂项法计算
problem.content:
(1) 阅读理解：$\frac{1}{2} + \frac{1}{3} = \frac{2+3}{2 \times 3} = \frac{5}{6}$，$\frac{1}{3} + \frac{1}{1} = \frac{1}{3}$，…，利用所得的规律计算下列各式：

$\frac{1}{3 \times 4} + \frac{3}{4 \times 7} + \frac{5}{7 \times 12} + \cdots + \frac{17}{19 \times 21}$

(2) 阅读理解：观察 $\frac{1}{n(n+1)} = \frac{1}{n} - \frac{1}{n+1}$，例：$\frac{5}{6} = \frac{1}{1} - \frac{1}{6} = \frac{1}{2} + \frac{1}{3}$

利用上述规律计算：$\frac{1}{1 \times 2} + \frac{1}{2 \times 3} + \frac{1}{3 \times 4} + \cdots + \frac{1}{2024 \times 2025}$
